name: Pixel Paint
overview: Create your very own pixel art with Pixel Paint! Pixel art is a picture created pixel by pixel - think retro games, and a good portion of current indie games. Base your creation off an old game, or create something entirely new! Pixel Paint includes tools to make it easy: Color palettes of some of the biggest retro systems Change brush size and shape Cut/copy/paste Color picker, fill color, and replace color All of that is wrapped up in an intuitive control scheme that makes creation easy. When your pixel art is complete, share it with the world by posting to Miiverse!
